data.title: Celebrate the Release of 72 Seasons with Your Local Radio Station
data.meta_description: Our friends at radio in the States and Canada are celebrating the release, too, as over 100 stations nationwide will be broadcasting a 60- or 90-minute special all about the making of the album and what we’ve been up to the last few years.
data.text: We’ve finally unleashed ***72 Seasons*** and hope that you’re enjoying digging into all 77 minutes of music! Our friends at radio in the States and Canada are celebrating the release, too, as over 100 stations nationwide will be broadcasting a 60- or 90-minute special all about the making of the album and what we’ve been up to the last few years. We connected with our very good friend David Fricke, who has been writing about rock music for as long as we’ve been around and hosts his own SiriusXM radio show, to talk about songwriting, the concept of ***72 Seasons***, what our lives were like during the pandemic, and thoughts about our 40th anniversary and beyond. Don’t worry if your local station is not broadcasting the special… we’ll have clips to share with you. And later this month, we’ll post the entire 90-minute version for your listening pleasure! **ALABAMA**\ WRTT - Huntsville - 4/14 @ 6pm **ALASKA** \ KFSE - Kenai Peninsula - TBD **ARIZONA**\ KUPD - Phoenix - 4/14 @ 9pm\ KFMA Rock 102.1 - Tucson - 4/15 @ 5pm **CALIFORNIA**\ KBCZ 89.3FM - Boulder Creek Community Radio - 4/14 @ 11pm\ KRQR - Chico/Redding - 4/14 @ 10pm\ KHKK - Modesto Stockton - 4/15 @ 9pm\ KCLB - Palm Springs - 4/15 @ 7pm\ KRRX - Redding - 4/14 @ 5:30pm\ KCAL - Riverside - 4/14 @ 10p / 4/16 @ 6am\ KZOZ - San Luis Obispo - 4/14 @ 7pm\ KJEE - Santa Barbara - TBD\ KIXA - Victor Valley - 4/14 @ 5pm **COLORADO**\ KILO - Colorado Springs - 4/14 @ 11pm / 4/15 @ 7pm\ KKFM - Colorado Springs - 4/16 @ 9pm\ KBPI - Denver - 4/14 @ 7pm **FLORIDA**\ WHOG - Daytona - 4/15 @ 9pm\ WKSM - Ft.
